sap.description: Unique identifier for an equipment record
sap.notes: Primary key in SAP Equipment table

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for equipment in MIMOSA data model
mimosa.notes: Primary key for Equipment entity

sap.description: Equipment Number - Unique identifier for equipment record
sap.notes: Primary key for equipment master in SAP

mimosa.description: Unique identifier assigned to each asset
mimosa.notes: Unique asset identifier mapped from SAP Equipment Number

sap.description: Unique Equipment Number
sap.notes: Used as primary identifier for equipment in SAP PM (Plant Maintenance)

mimosa.description: Globally unique equipment identifier
mimosa.notes: Serves as unique asset key in MIMOSA O&M models

sap.description: Unique identifier for equipment in SAP
sap.notes: Primary key for equipment master record

mimosa.description: Globally unique, persistent identity for an asset
mimosa.notes: Serves as the asset's primary identifier within MIMOSA

sap.description: Equipment Number - unique identifier for equipment
sap.notes: Primary key for equipment in SAP.

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for an asset
mimosa.notes: Serves as the primary key for asset in MIMOSA.

sap.description: Equipment Short Description
sap.notes: Short text used to describe the equipment.

mimosa.description: Short description or name of the asset
mimosa.notes: Commonly used field for quick identification.

sap.description: Equipment Number - unique identifier for equipment in SAP
sap.notes: Primary key for equipment master record

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for an asset in MIMOSA
mimosa.notes: Serves as a global unique asset reference

sap.description: Functional Location - hierarchical location structure for technical objects
sap.notes: Used to structure and manage plant assets by location

mimosa.description: Identifier for a physical or logical location in MIMOSA
mimosa.notes: Unique location reference; supports hierarchical structures

sap.description: Equipment Number - unique identifier for equipment
sap.notes: Primary key for equipment records in SAP

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for a physical asset in MIMOSA
mimosa.notes: Serves as primary identifier for the asset

sap.description: Functional Location - structured address of an asset
sap.notes: Identifies the functional location within the plant

mimosa.description: Hierarchical identifier for a functional location
mimosa.notes: Derived from organization's facility structure

sap.description: Unique identifier for an order in SAP
sap.notes: May be used as primary key for order mapping

mimosa.description: Unique short identifier for the work order
mimosa.notes: Primary identifier; should be unique

sap.description: Defines the category/type of order (e.g., PM, CS)

mimosa.description: Short code identifying the nature (type) of the work order

sap.description: User or person who entered the order
sap.notes: User ID

mimosa.description: Full name of the creator or entrant of the WorkOrder

sap.description: Date and time when the order was created

mimosa.description: Timestamp for creation of work order

sap.description: User who last edited the order

mimosa.description: Full name of the last editor of the WorkOrder

sap.fieldName: Change date for Order Number, Changed at
sap.description: Date and time of last change to the order

mimosa.description: Timestamp for latest change

sap.fieldName: PM Order: Reference Date, Time of Reference Date
sap.description: Reference date/time for PM order (usually scheduled start)

mimosa.description: Constraint for scheduled start (must start before)

sap.description: Scheduled end date of the work order

mimosa.description: Date/time by which work should be finished

sap.description: Short description or title of the order

mimosa.description: Descriptive name or title for the work order

sap.description: Free-form, long text description for the work order
sap.notes: SAP allows multiple long text lines

mimosa.description: Long text description for the work order
mimosa.notes: Concatenate if multiple SAP text lines

sap.description: Priority for the work order, indicating urgency or importance

mimosa.description: Code or type indicating order's priority

sap.description: Unique equipment identifier
sap.notes: Link to equipment master

mimosa.description: Short unique identifier code for the asset

sap.description: Code identifying the work center where the work is performed

mimosa.description: Short code for the resource or team (work center) in MIMOSA
mimosa.notes: Can also map to organizational asset or resource

sap.description: Plant/facility code responsible for the work center

mimosa.description: Unique code/name for the site/facility

sap.description: Plant responsible for maintenance activities

mimosa.description: Unique code/name for the site responsible for the asset

sap.description: Specific location within the plant for the asset

mimosa.description: Short code for the segment/location within the site

sap.description: Structured label (often hierarchical) for functional location

mimosa.description: Full description for the functional segment

sap.fieldName: System Individual status of an object (short form)
sap.description: Internal SAP system status for object (short form, from TJ02T)

mimosa.description: Short code representing order status

sap.fieldName: User Individual status of an object (short form)
sap.description: User-defined status for order (short form, from TJ30T)

mimosa.description: Long description of the order's status

sap.fieldName: Planner Group for Customer Service and Plant Maintenance
sap.description: Person/group responsible for planning PM/CS orders

mimosa.description: Short name/code of responsible person or group

sap.description: Long name of the maintenance planner group

mimosa.description: Full name of person or group responsible for planning

sap.description: Type code categorising the kind of maintenance activity
sap.notes: Links to T353I_T

mimosa.description: Short name of work type assigned to this activity/step

sap.description: Long descriptive text for maintenance activity type

mimosa.description: Full descriptive name of work type

sap.description: System/asset condition at order creation (code)

mimosa.description: Numeric or coded state representing asset's health/condition

sap.description: Text description of operating/machine condition

mimosa.description: Qualitative or categorical asset condition description

sap.fieldName: Revision for Plant Maintenance and Customer Service
sap.description: Revision code for grouping orders/notifications

mimosa.description: Short code indicating lifecycle status (e.g., revision)

sap.description: Text description for revision code

mimosa.description: Descriptive name for lifecycle status or revision

sap.description: ABC indicator categorizing object importance

mimosa.description: Asset importance/classification indicator

sap.fieldName: Text for ABC Indicator for Technical Objects
sap.description: Descriptive text for ABC technical object category

mimosa.description: Long description of asset classification indicator

sap.description: Partner number for person or organization linked to order

mimosa.description: Short unique code for Agent (person or org)
mimosa.notes: Should relate to Agent records

sap.description: Full name for business partner/person

mimosa.description: Full name for Agent (person)

sap.description: Reference number to related notification/document

mimosa.description: Reference to related request/notification in MIMOSA
mimosa.notes: Relation only if source notification exists in MIMOSA

sap.notes: Not mapped

mimosa.notes: Empty mapping

sap.notes: Not mapped

mimosa.notes: Empty mapping

sap.notes: Not mapped

mimosa.notes: Empty mapping

sap.description: Duplicate entry - see above
sap.notes: Primary identifier

mimosa.description: See earlier entry for mapping

sap.description: Duplicate entry - see above

mimosa.description: See mapping above

sap.description: Unique operation/step ID in work order

mimosa.description: Short unique identifier for the work step/operation

sap.description: Control parameters for order operation (T430 description)

mimosa.description: Mapping for operation control parameters if schema allows

sap.description: Reference to standard operations text

mimosa.description: Reference to standard operation text (if supported)

sap.description: Short description of work center

mimosa.description: Full description of the work center resource

sap.description: Categorization of operation (work type for costing, etc)

mimosa.description: Short code for work task type

sap.description: Short free-form text for operation/step

mimosa.description: Long description for the work step/operation

sap.description: Planned/expected duration for the operation

mimosa.description: Expected or planned duration of event (operation/step)

sap.description: Unit of time for planned operation duration

mimosa.description: Unit for expected/planned duration

sap.fieldName: Constraint on the basic start date for the activity
sap.description: Earliest permitted start date/time for step

mimosa.description: Must start before this date/time

sap.fieldName: Constraint on the finish date of activity
sap.description: Latest permitted finish date/time for step

mimosa.description: Step must be finished before this date/time

sap.description: Earliest scheduled start for the operation

mimosa.description: Operation must not start before this time

sap.description: Earliest possible finish for the operation

mimosa.description: Step must not finish before this time

sap.fieldName: Key word ID for user-defined fields
sap.description: Custom keyword for additional user field(s) in operation

mimosa.description: Reserved for custom keywords (use MIMOSA extension if needed)

sap.description: Custom user field defined in operation

mimosa.description: Reserved for user extension (custom field); requires schema extension

sap.description: Parent/master work order number (if hierarchical)

mimosa.description: ShortName of parent WorkOrder if hierarchical

sap.description: Activity/operation number in header; Equipment id

mimosa.description: WorkOrder short name and related Asset short name
mimosa.notes: Multiple fields

sap.description: Duplicate mapping, see above

mimosa.description: Duplicate, see above

sap.description: Status/condition code of system during operation

mimosa.description: Reflects health/condition assessment during operation

sap.fieldName: Account Number of Vendor or Creditor
sap.description: Purchasing vendor account code for external operation

mimosa.description: Vendor agent/organization short code
mimosa.notes: Linked via external reference

sap.description: Hierarchical key for physical location in plant

mimosa.description: Functional/hierarchical segment of asset/site

sap.description: Duplicate mapping, see IFLOS above

mimosa.description: Duplicate, see IFLOS mapping above

sap.description: Short description for functional location

mimosa.description: Full descriptive name for the functional segment type

sap.description: Language in which functional location description is written

mimosa.description: Language code for the description (if supported by schema)

sap.description: Unique plant/site code

mimosa.description: Site/Facility unique code

sap.description: Unique identifier for the order in SAP.
sap.notes: Maps to IDInInfoSource for the WorkOrder if SAP is the system of record.

mimosa.description: Externally supplied identifier for the order in the InfoSource.
mimosa.notes: Should explicitly use IDInInfoSource, not ShortName.

sap.description: Indicator identifying the order type, such as PM01.
sap.notes: Map Order Type code to the correct WorkManagementType in MIMOSA, using a cross-reference to a Reference Data entry, e.g., 'Maintenance, Corrective'.

mimosa.description: Reference Data Identifier for WorkManagementType mapping.
mimosa.notes: Must use lookup table for correct mapping from SAP Order Type.

sap.description: User ID of creator.
sap.notes: Map to Agent entity where IDInInfoSource matches this SAP user ID.

mimosa.description: Identifier for Agent (creator), with FullName as descriptive information.
mimosa.notes: Link Agent/IDInInfoSource for user correlation.

sap.description: Timestamp of order creation.

mimosa.description: Date and time order was created.

sap.description: User ID of person who last updated the order.
sap.notes: Same mapping logic as 'Entered by'.

mimosa.description: Identifier for Agent (last editor).
mimosa.notes: Link Agent/IDInInfoSource; consider referencing explicitly as LastEditor.

sap.fieldName: Change date for Order Number, Changed at
sap.description: Timestamp for the last change to the order.

mimosa.description: Timestamp when the record was last updated.

sap.fieldName: PM Order: Reference Date, Time of Reference Date
sap.description: Date/time reference for when the work is to start.
sap.notes: Use 'Basic start' from BAPI structure if available; else, reference date.

mimosa.description: Earliest time work should start.

sap.description: Scheduled finish date for the work order.
sap.notes: BAPI 'Basic end' should take precedence if available.

mimosa.description: Required finish date/time.

sap.description: SAP short text for order.
sap.notes: Map to WorkOrder.ShortName.

mimosa.description: Short description or title of the order.

sap.description: Long text for order.

mimosa.description: Longer user-entered description.

sap.description: Order priority code (1-4/5).
sap.notes: Map to standard PriorityLevelType values using a cross-reference: 1=Highest, 2=High, 3=Moderate, 4=Low.

mimosa.description: Reference data code for priority.
mimosa.notes: Should use reference library for controlled vocabulary.

sap.description: Number identifying the equipment.
sap.notes: Corresponds to Asset's IDInInfoSource.

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for the asset within the InfoSource.

sap.description: Work Center responsible for execution and/or financial tracking.
sap.notes: Map to Segment (if mapped to breakdown structure) or consider using custom property for WorkCenter.

mimosa.description: Short name for the Segment representing the Work Center.
mimosa.notes: If represented in breakdown structure, else use Property.

sap.description: Plant associated with the Work Center.
sap.notes: Map to Site or Segment that matches Plant code.

mimosa.description: Identifier for site/location of the plant.

sap.description: Plant responsible for maintenance.
sap.notes: Map to Site entity with Matching IDInInfoSource.

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for site.

sap.description: Sub-location within the plant where object is installed.
sap.notes: Map to Segment representing location. If only descriptive, use ShortName.

mimosa.description: Short name for location segment.

sap.description: Label for functional location.
sap.notes: Map to Segment FullName matching functional location.

mimosa.description: Full descriptive name of the functional location.

sap.fieldName: System Individual status of an object (short form) - Table TJ02T?
sap.description: Short code for status.
sap.notes: Links to WorkStatusType reference; create new WorkStatus record per change.

mimosa.description: Abbreviated status as reference data.
mimosa.notes: Use controlled vocabulary from Reference Data.

sap.fieldName: User Individual status of an object (short form) - Table TJ30T?
sap.description: User-driven status code.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStatus.FullName for descriptive status; see above.

mimosa.description: Full description of user status.

sap.fieldName: Planner Group for Customer Service and Plant Maintenance
sap.description: Identifies planner group responsible for the order.
sap.notes: Reference to Agent entity. Planner Group should have role AgentRoleType='Planner Group'.

mimosa.description: Agent representing planner group, referenced by appropriate AgentRoleType.
mimosa.notes: Correlate SAP planner group by ID to Agent/Role.

sap.description: Text for planner group.
sap.notes: Map to Agent.FullName.

mimosa.description: Full descriptive name of the planner group Agent.

sap.description: Categorization of the activity (e.g., 1,2,3,etc).
sap.notes: Map activity type code to WorkManagementType. Used for specialized work step/type.

mimosa.description: Reference code for WorkManagementType (typically at Step/Operation level).

sap.description: Long text for activity type.
sap.notes: Maps to WorkManagementType.FullName.

mimosa.description: Full name for WorkManagementType reference data.

sap.description: Condition of system (e.g., 1=running, 2=shut down).
sap.notes: Map to HealthLevelType reference data.

mimosa.description: Reference value representing health/state.

sap.description: Description of condition code.
sap.notes: Maps to HealthLevelType.FullName.

mimosa.description: Description of health level type.

sap.fieldName: Revision for Plant Maintenance and Customer Service
sap.description: Revision group identifier.
sap.notes: Usually used for grouping work orders (parent/child hierarchy).

mimosa.description: ID of parent work order (grouping).
mimosa.notes: Link back to parent/Revision record.

sap.description: Long text for revision.
sap.notes: Map to work order grouping/parent description.

mimosa.description: Description of revision group or parent work order.

sap.description: Indicates criticality ABC for technical object.
sap.notes: Maps to Segment.Criticality/ CriticalityScaleType.

mimosa.description: Criticality of the Segment (e.g., ABC scale).
mimosa.notes: Use CriticalityScaleType in MIMOSA reference data.

sap.fieldName: Text for ABC Indicator for Technical Objects
sap.description: Descriptive text for criticality indicator.
sap.notes: Maps to Segment.Criticality/Description.

mimosa.description: Descriptive text of criticality for segment.

sap.description: Partner role/ID assigned to the object.
sap.notes: Map to Agent representing business partner via AgentRoleWithWork, use AgentRoleType (e.g., 'Partner').

mimosa.description: Identifier for Agent representing the Partner.
mimosa.notes: Use AgentRoleWithWork for role information.

sap.description: Name of person assigned as partner in IHPA.
sap.notes: Map to Agent.FullName; context is from Partner mapping.

mimosa.description: Full name for the Agent (person).

sap.description: Links to the SAP notification/ request for work.
sap.notes: Link to RequestForWork entity in MIMOSA.

mimosa.description: Identifier for request/notification linked to WorkOrder.

sap.description: Unique identifier for operation (work step) in a work order.
sap.notes: Maps to WorkStep.IDInInfoSource; each operation is a WorkStep.

mimosa.description: Identifies the individual WorkStep.

sap.fieldName: Control Key (See Table T430 for Description)
sap.description: Determines type of control/operation (e.g., PM01, External, Internal, etc).
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.WorkTaskType or WorkTaskType.ShortName using reference mapping.

mimosa.description: Type of the work step/task.

sap.fieldName: Standard text key (See Table 435 for Values)
sap.description: Reference key for standard operation text.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.StandardTextID if available; otherwise consider WorkStep.Description.

mimosa.description: Reference to standard operation text.

sap.description: Brief description of operation (activity).
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.ShortName.

mimosa.description: Short descriptive name of WorkStep.

sap.description: Type/category of the activity performed at this step.
sap.notes: Map to WorkTaskType.IDInInfoSource or lookup from activity type to WorkTaskType for taxonomy.

mimosa.description: Reference for WorkTaskType for the WorkStep.

sap.fieldName: Values/Activity Number; Normal duration of activity
sap.description: Planned/normal duration of a work step.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.Duration.Planned.

mimosa.description: Expected/planned duration for the WorkStep.

sap.description: Unit for planned duration.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.PlannedDurationUnit.

mimosa.description: Unit of measure for the planned duration.

sap.fieldName: Values/Activity Number; Constraint on the basic start date for the activity
sap.description: Earliest allowed start date/time for operation.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.StartBefore.

mimosa.description: Constraint: Earliest start of the work step.

sap.fieldName: Values/Activity Number; Constraint on the finish date of activity
sap.description: Latest allowed end date/time for operation.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.EndBefore.

mimosa.description: Constraint: Latest finish of the work step.

sap.fieldName: Values/Activity Number; Earliest scheduled start (date and time)
sap.description: Earliest scheduled start (date/time) for the operation.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.StartAfter.

mimosa.description: Earliest scheduled time the WorkStep may start.

sap.fieldName: Values/Activity Number; Earliest scheduled finish (date and time)
sap.description: Earliest scheduled finish (date and time) for operation.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.EndAfter.

mimosa.description: Earliest scheduled finish time for the WorkStep.

sap.fieldName: Fields/Activity Number; Key word ID for user-defined fields
sap.description: Custom user-defined field identifier.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.Property.Key or custom property.

mimosa.description: Key/alias for user property on the WorkStep.

sap.fieldName: Fields/Activity Number; User field with 20 characters
sap.description: User custom value for operation.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.Property.Value.

mimosa.description: Value for the user property.

sap.description: System condition during operation.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.HealthAssessment.HealthLevelType or similar.

mimosa.description: Assessment of system state during the work step.

sap.fieldName: Account Number of Vendor or Creditor
sap.description: Vendor account for purchasing step.
sap.notes: Map to Agent.IDInInfoSource of vendor; if relevant as asset manufacturer, map to Asset.Manufacturer.

mimosa.description: Manufacturer or vendor for asset or step.

sap.description: Hierarchical breakdown location for asset.
sap.notes: Maps to Segment.IDInInfoSource representing the breakdown structure.

mimosa.description: Identifier for functional location (Segment).

sap.description: Short description for functional location.
sap.notes: If object-specific, maps to Segment.FullName; else, ties to SegmentType.ShortName.

mimosa.description: Unique name/label for segment in breakdown structure.

sap.description: Language of functional location text.
sap.notes: Maps to language attribute on MIMOSA TextType (e.g., FullName/@language).

mimosa.description: Indicates language code for the name.

sap.description: Plant code.

mimosa.description: Site identifier for the plant.

sap.description: Unique identifier for an equipment record
sap.notes: Equipment Number in SAP Plant Maintenance (PM)

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for an asset in MIMOSA
mimosa.notes: Primary asset identification in MIMOSA CRIS

sap.description: Unique identifier for equipment record
sap.notes: Primary key for equipment in SAP PM module

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for an equipment asset
mimosa.notes: Primary identifier for equipment in MIMOSA data model

sap.description: Unique identifier for the equipment
sap.notes: Primary key for equipment master data

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for an asset within the system
mimosa.notes: Serves as the unique reference for assets

sap.description: Unique identification number for the equipment
sap.notes: Primary key field in SAP equipment master

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for the equipment
mimosa.notes: Serves as the unique equipment identifier in MIMOSA data model

sap.description: Equipment Number
sap.notes: Unique identifier for equipment in SAP PM module.

mimosa.description: Unique Identifier for Asset
mimosa.notes: Primary key for asset across MIMOSA-compliant systems.

sap.description: Unique equipment number identifying an individual asset in SAP
sap.notes: Primary identifier for equipment objects in SAP PM

mimosa.description: Globally unique identifier for the asset within MIMOSA standards
mimosa.notes: Primary key for Asset entity, can be mapped to SAP's equipment number

sap.description: Unique identifier for a work order in SAP.
sap.notes: Map to IDInInfoSource in MIMOSA; this is the unique identifier if SAP is the system of record.

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for WorkOrder from the originating InfoSource (SAP).
mimosa.notes: Primary key for exchanged work orders.

sap.description: Order category (e.g., PM01 for corrective maintenance).
sap.notes: Should be mapped to a reference data entry in MIMOSA WorkManagementType.ShortName, matching the type code or mapped category.

mimosa.description: Standardized work order type (e.g., Corrective Maintenance).
mimosa.notes: Map SAP order types to established MIMOSA WorkManagementType reference data.

sap.description: SAP User ID of the person who created the order.
sap.notes: Map to Agent entity where Agent.IDInInfoSource matches this SAP user ID. Map into /Creator/IDInInfoSource and /Creator/FullName if possible.

mimosa.description: The person who created the WorkOrder.
mimosa.notes: Assign creator agent to work order using both ID and, if available, full name.

sap.description: Date and time the order was created.
sap.notes: Map both date and time.

mimosa.description: Timestamp when the work order was created.

sap.description: SAP User ID of the person who last changed the order.
sap.notes: Map to Agent entity as per 'Entered by', but as last editor.

mimosa.description: The person who last edited the WorkOrder.
mimosa.notes: Assign last editor agent fields; FullName if available.

sap.fieldName: Change date for Order Number, Changed at
sap.description: Date/time of last change to order.

mimosa.description: Date/time the WorkOrder was last changed.

sap.fieldName: PM Order: Reference Date, Time of Reference Date
sap.description: Reference start date/time for work execution.
sap.notes: Often 'Basic start' in SAP BAPI structure, to WorkOrder.StartBefore in MIMOSA.

mimosa.description: Start work before this date/time.

sap.description: Planned basic finish date for an order (Production).
sap.notes: SAP BAPI has 'Basic end', should be mapped to WorkOrder.EndBefore in MIMOSA.

mimosa.description: Finish work before this date/time.

sap.description: Short text description for the order.
sap.notes: Should map to WorkOrder.FullName for a descriptive name.

mimosa.description: Short, descriptive name of the work order.
mimosa.notes: For user-friendly work order title.

sap.description: Multi-line long description for the work order.

mimosa.description: Detailed description of the work order.

sap.description: Priority for work order (1-4 in SAP standard).
sap.notes: Should map to PriorityLevelType (reference item) in MIMOSA. Map SAP values to correct reference values.

mimosa.description: Standardized value for work order priority.
mimosa.notes: Use mapped reference data for priorities.

sap.description: Identifier for the equipment being maintained.
sap.notes: Maps to Asset. Use Asset.IDInInfoSource to match Equipment Number, plus Asset.ShortName.

mimosa.description: Asset associated with the work order.
mimosa.notes: Link to Asset entity instance using Equipment Number.

sap.description: Unique ID for SAP Work Centre.
sap.notes: Can be mapped to MIMOSA Segment or Organization, or to a CustomProperty of WorkOrder/WorkStep as 'WorkCenter'. Not always required to exchange. Consider model extension/custom property.

mimosa.description: Identifies the work center responsible.
mimosa.notes: Recommended: use CustomProperty if no standard equivalent.

sap.description: Plant associated with the Work Center.
sap.notes: Should map to Site, Segment or Organization structure in MIMOSA. Often corresponds to /Segment/RegistrationSite/ShortName.

mimosa.description: Plant/site where the work center is located.

sap.description: Plant ID where maintenance is performed.
sap.notes: Map to MIMOSA Site entity where Site.ShortName equals Maintenance Plant.

mimosa.description: Short name/code for the site.

sap.description: Specific location within the plant for maintenance object.
sap.notes: May map to Segment entity for sub-location or physical unit, i.e., Segment.ShortName.

mimosa.description: Short name of segment/location.

sap.description: Text label for the functional location.
sap.notes: Represents the label for a Functional Location (Segment). Always reference Segment.FullName in MIMOSA.

mimosa.description: The full, descriptive name of the segment (functional location).

sap.fieldName: System Individual status of an object (short form) - Table TJ02T?
sap.description: Short code for system-derived status.
sap.notes: Should be mapped to WorkStatusType.ShortName in MIMOSA. Status changes create new WorkStatus records referencing correct WorkStatusType.

mimosa.description: Short name for work status.

sap.fieldName: User Individual status of an object (short form) - Table TJ30T?
sap.description: Short code for user-derived status.
sap.notes: Maps to WorkStatusType.FullName in MIMOSA (the long status description).

mimosa.description: Full name of work status.

sap.fieldName: Planner Group for Customer Service and Plant Maintenance
sap.description: Maintenance planner group code.
sap.notes: Reference an Agent entity for the planner group; add AgentRoleType for 'Planner Group'.

mimosa.description: Agent representing the planner group.
mimosa.notes: Link agent role for planner group as appropriate, with AgentRoleType.

sap.description: Full name of planner group.
sap.notes: Map to Agent.FullName.

mimosa.description: Full human-readable name of the planner group (Agent).

sap.description: Activity type 'e.g. preventive/corrective'.
sap.notes: Map to more specialized WorkManagementType.ShortName, especially for WorkSteps.

mimosa.description: Name/Type of maintenance activity in standard taxonomy.
mimosa.notes: Typically used for steps, link via WorkStep.WorkManagementType.

sap.description: Human-readable activity type description.
sap.notes: Map to WorkManagementType.FullName for WorkSteps.

mimosa.description: Fully qualified name for maintenance activity type.

sap.description: System/equipment health or availability indicator.
sap.notes: Map to HealthAssessment.HealthLevelPrecise referencing HealthLevelType.

mimosa.description: Assessment of health/condition of the asset.
mimosa.notes: Should reference mapped HealthLevelType.

sap.description: Descriptive text for machine/system condition.
sap.notes: Not mapped directly, but see HealthAssessment.HealthLevelType (reference value).

mimosa.description: Categorical level of health/condition.

sap.fieldName: Revision for Plant Maintenance and Customer Service
sap.description: Revision grouping work order for common execution window.
sap.notes: Map to parent work order in WorkOrderHierarchy or PresentLifeCycleStatus.ShortName.

mimosa.description: Short name for the revision grouping or status.
mimosa.notes: May indicate a grouped status or parent order.

sap.description: Long description for maintenance revision.
sap.notes: Map to PresentLifeCycleStatus.FullName.

mimosa.description: Full description of life cycle status or revision.

sap.description: Criticality (A/B/C) indicator of technical object.
sap.notes: Should map to Segment.Criticality and/or reference CriticalityScaleType if available.

mimosa.description: Criticality indicator for the segment.
mimosa.notes: ScaleType reference, e.g., 'A','B','C' with explanations.

sap.fieldName: Text for ABC Indicator for Technical Objects
sap.description: Descriptive text for ABC indicator.
sap.notes: Maps to explanation for Segment.Criticality or as a property.

mimosa.description: Explanatory text for the criticality rating.

sap.description: Business partner involved in the maintenance order.
sap.notes: Map to Agent/AgentRoleWithWork for partner roles on work order; Agent.ShortName.

mimosa.description: Short identifier for the partner agent.

sap.description: Full name of the person (from address data).
sap.notes: Use to populate Agent.FullName in MIMOSA.

mimosa.description: Agent's complete human-readable name.

sap.description: Reference to originating Maintenance Notification.
sap.notes: Map to RequestForWork entity in MIMOSA where applicable.

mimosa.description: Unique notification/request id.
mimosa.notes: Link notifications to originating requests for work.

sap.description: Unique identifier for the operation/activity (work step).
sap.notes: Operations in Maintenance Orders are WorkSteps in MIMOSA; map as WorkStep.IDInInfoSource.

mimosa.description: Unique identifier for the step within a work order.

sap.description: Indicates type of operation (manual, external, scheduling params, etc.).
sap.notes: May map to WorkTaskType.ShortName reference or WorkStep.WorkManagementType.

mimosa.description: Type for broad operation category.
mimosa.notes: Add reference mapping as needed.

sap.fieldName: Standard text key (See Table 435 for Values)
sap.description: Reference to standard operation text.
sap.notes: If required, could map as a custom property or reference document.

mimosa.description: Reference to standardized task documentation.

sap.description: Short description of the operation.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.ShortName.

mimosa.description: Short descriptive name for a work step.

sap.fieldName: Values/Activity Number; Normal duration of activity
sap.description: Planned time duration for operation.
sap.notes: Maps to WorkStep.PlannedDuration.

mimosa.description: Planned duration for the step.

sap.description: Unit of time for duration (e.g., h = hours).
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.PlannedDurationUnit or WorkStep.Measure.UnitOfMeasure.

mimosa.description: Unit for planned duration.

sap.fieldName: Values/Activity Number; Constraint on the basic start date for the activity
sap.description: Earliest possible start date/time for the operation.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.StartBefore.

mimosa.description: Operation must start before this time.

sap.fieldName: Values/Activity Number; Constraint on the finish date of activity
sap.description: Latest allowed finish for the operation.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.EndBefore.

mimosa.description: Operation must complete before this time.

sap.fieldName: Values/Activity Number; Earliest scheduled start (date and time)
sap.description: Earliest scheduled start time per SAP scheduling.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.StartAfter.

mimosa.description: Operation cannot start before this time.

sap.fieldName: Values/Activity Number; Earliest scheduled finish (date and time)
sap.description: Earliest scheduled finish time per SAP scheduling.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.EndAfter.

mimosa.description: Operation cannot finish before this time.

sap.fieldName: Fields/Activity Number; Key word ID for user-defined fields
sap.description: User-defined keyword for the operation.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.CustomProperty (Name/Value).

mimosa.description: User-defined property for the step.

sap.fieldName: Fields/Activity Number; User field with 20 characters
sap.description: User-defined field value for the operation.
sap.notes: Map to WorkStep.CustomProperty (Name/Value).

mimosa.description: User-defined property value for the step.
